msg: OAK-828 Lucene support for index aggregates

author: markt
msg: Refactor to enabling reloading rather than redploying of a context when a WAR file changes and there is an XML file present in the Host's configBase. In this scenario, the context object doesn't need to be re-created because it's config won't change - it is defined by the unchanged XML file in the HOst's configBase.

msg: [CXF-5010] Add customizable request logging capability to STS
